item.title: Linksys WRT54G Ultimate Hacking
item.description: Of course I am a little late, but litterally the ULTIMATE guide to wrt54g hacking is shipping: http://www.amazon.com/Linksys-WRT54G-Ultimate-Hacking-Asadoorian/dp/1597491667 Also, you can check out Paul Asadoorian and Larry Pesce at http://www.pauldotcom.com You can also download the PDF version of the book at: http://www.syngress.com/catalog/?pid=4170 CONGRATS GUYS… now where is my free copy? mubix

item.title: WEP
item.description: Ok, yes, again. It has been a while. But I am back. I got a new Wireless PCMCIA card (ORiNOCO a/b/g Combo Card Gold). So far it is a great card. 9AFED9BEADBBD9236159D54CAE - tsunami 1B59B6E87D19E9A6F1D37CB762 - home â€™nuf said.
